unit_rules.name: Summary Execution
unit_rules.text: Once per Battle Round, before Activating a unit, select one friendly Battle-Shocked +Astra Militarum+ +Infantry+ unit within 12". If you do, destroy one model in that unit, and it is no longer Battle-Shocked.

unit_rules.name: Political Overwatch
unit_rules.text: While another +Officer+ is in the same unit as this model, this unit can re-roll Battle-Shock tests.

unit_rules.name: Orders
unit_rules.text: This +Officer+ can issue one "Duty and Honor!" or "Fix Bayonets!" Order to a +Regiment+ unit.
